original: Clemedtson, Jeppe, direktör, Tren-sum, f. 26/6/85 i Hällaryd, Blek. 1., av Sven C. o. Emelie Jeppsison. G. 17 m. Svea Nilsson. Barn: Gunvor f. 18, Henning 20, Karin 23, Bengt 28. •— Stud:res. t. Tyskl., Österr., Tjecko-slov., Holl., Danm., Norge, Einl. o. USA, resa f. agrikult. stud. 46. Omb:-man o. verkst. led. av styr. f. Brand-försäkr :bol. å landet inom Blek., verkst. dir. i A-B Blek. L. Lantm:-förb. o. Sv:es ’stärkelseproducenters fören. Landstingsm., ordf. i komm:-fullm. o. kommrstämma, led. av riksd. andra kamm. 21, av första kamm. 24- 31, led. av tillf. utsk. 21, suppl. i be-villniutsk. 24-26, i första tillf. utsk. 25, särsk. utsk. 25, andra lagutsk. 25, statsutsk. 27-31, v. ordf. i Hällaryds Sparbank, ordf. i styr. f. Blek. 1. mod. valmansförb. RNO, RVO, PatrstGM, Blek. 1. hushisällsk. stGM.
translated: Clemedtson, Jeppe, director, Trensum, b. 26/6/85 in Hällaryd, Blekinge, eldest son of Sven C. and Emelie Jeppsson. Married at 17 to Svea Nilsson. Children: Gunvor b. 1918, Henning b. 1920, Karin b. 1923, Bengt b. 1928. — Studied abroad in Germany, Austria, Czechoslovakia, Holland, Denmark, Norway, and the USA, for agricultural studies in 1946. Chairman and executive board member of the rural fire insurance company in Blekinge, executive director of A-B Blek. L. Lantm. Association and Swedish starch producers' association. County council member, chairman of municipal council and council meeting. Member of the second chamber of parliament in 1921 and the first chamber from 1924 to 1931, member of temporary committee in 1921, supplemental member of the budget committee from 1924 to 1926, supplemental member of the first temporary committee in 1925, special committee in 1925, second legal committee in 1925, the state committee from 1927 to 1931. Vice chairman of Hällaryd Savings Bank, chairman of the executive board of Blekinge's Modern Electoral Association. RNO, RVO, PatrstGM, Blekinge housewife Association stGM.

awards.name: Royal Order of the North Star
